column2: September – Pulled over with Jennifer Robinshon in car and claimed she was friend’sdaughter he was taking home

December – Hired at Kaiser Aluminum Plant and takes job as replacement workerand works as a carbon setter which is a very physical job and trains as a craneoperator

October 26 – Sentenced by Judge to 408 years in Spokane
